entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:31 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
